function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of infectious diseases in urban settings due to population density","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases leading to higher infection rates and mortality in densely populated urban areas","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted interventions and public health measures to address urban-specific risk factors","Technologies":"Data analysis and mapping tools for spatial patterns of transmissibility and mortality impact","People":"Urban residents, especially those in densely populated areas","Owner":"Public health authorities and urban planners"},{"Description":"Inequities faced by different social groups in urban settings","Impact":"Higher susceptibility and lower resilience of marginalized communities to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing localized approaches to improve community susceptibility and levels of resilience","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms and targeted public health interventions","People":"Marginalized communities and social groups in urban areas","Owner":"Community leaders, local government, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of clear relationship between population density and infectious disease transmission","Impact":"Ineffective use of population density as a sole factor to predict transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Conducting targeted studies and data analysis to understand the complex relationship between density, urbanization, and infectious disease transmission","Technologies":"Data analysis, epidemiological modeling, and geographic information systems (GIS)","People":"Researchers, epidemiologists, and public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"}]}
